title: [Large-Scale] Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Workshop on Radiation Therapy Physics

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Radiation Physics Theory and Understanding of Medical Linear Accelerator Structures
context.additional_context: For pre-service/in-service teachers, intermediate professional level, in digital device-provided environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for applying Monte-Carlo modeling in radiation therapy planning using PBL approaches
Learners can analyze principles of dose distribution optimization through inverse treatment planning simulations
Learners can participate in collaborative problem-solving processes with peers at over 80% engagement using real-time collaboration tools (ZOOM Breakout Rooms)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
